body:
## Actual Behavior

`getWorkflowExecutionHistory` for archival namespace returns “INVALID_ARGUMENT: requested workflow history does not exist” error.

## Expected Behavior

It looks like the status code is mismatched and NOT_FOUND should be returned for this situation.

Reproduces on v1.13.0

comments.body: Thanks for raising this issue! Should be closed with https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/3340

title: getWorkflowExecutionHistory for archival namespace returns an incorrect status code
